oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena

Class OracleTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.spatial.rdf.client.jena.OracleTranslator

  • public class OracleTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a helper class that translates between Jena Nodes and the internal representation of values expected by Oracle. This class is mainly for internal use.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ADD_REMOVE
      A constant denoting that the operation context is either ADD or REMOVE (DML).
      static int SELECT
      A constant denoting that the operation context is SELECT.

    • Method Detail

      • decodeBNode

        public org.apache.jena.graph.Node decodeBNode(java.lang.String str)
        Decodes an encoded string and creates a corresponding blank node. It is the reverse of encodeBNode(String).

      • decodeURI

        public org.apache.jena.graph.Node decodeURI(java.lang.String uri)
        Creates a Node instance using the URI value passed in.
        Parameters:
        uri - the string of a URI

      • encode

        public java.lang.String encode(org.apache.jena.graph.Node node,
                               int operationType)
        Encodes a Node as a String suitable for use in a SQL statement with the Oracle RDF/OWL/SKOS data model. URIs are quoted with <...>. Literals are quoted with double quotes.
        Parameters:
        node - the Node instance to be encoded
        operationType - specifies the type of operation

      • encode

        public java.lang.String encode(org.apache.jena.graph.Node node,
                               int operationType,
                               boolean useNamespace)
        Encodes a Node as a String suitable for use in a SQL statement with the Oracle RDF/OWL/SKOS data model. URIs are quoted with <...>. Literals are quoted with double quotes. Parameter useNamespace will determine whether the namespaces prefix will be used, if applicable.
        Parameters:
        node - the Node instance to be encoded
        operationType - specifies the type of operation
        useNamespace - specifies that some predefined prefixes are used if set to true

      • encodeBNode

        public java.lang.String encodeBNode(java.lang.String str)
        Encodes a blank node is a form that complies with standard BNF. For any illegal character, encodes using its ASCII value as a literal String. For blank node containing illegal characters, a prefix of _:ORABNENC will be added.

      • escapeLiteralObjectVal

        public static java.lang.String escapeLiteralObjectVal(java.lang.String s,
                                                      int operationType)

      • escapeQuote

        public static java.lang.String escapeQuote(java.lang.String s,
                                           int operationType)
        Escapes "'" as "''" and """ as "\"".
        Parameters:
        s - the string
        operationType - the type of SQL operation
        Returns:
        The string or an escaped version of the string.

      • getRDFDatatype

        public org.apache.jena.datatypes.RDFDatatype getRDFDatatype(java.lang.String uri)
        Returns an instance of RDFDatatype based on the value passed in.
        Parameters:
        uri - the type uri for the data

      • unescapeLiteral

        public static java.lang.String unescapeLiteral(java.lang.String s)
        Unescape literal object value (after reading from SDO_RDF_MATCH result set)
